participant_1.background:
I have a cat and he is the light of my life.
I sometimes trip over my own feet when I'm playing tennis.
i have 5 brothers and sisters.
my favorite band is the rolling stones.
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

participant_2.background:
I'm not the most coordinated person, and I'm always tripping over my own feet.
i love money.
I'm more interested in my education and my family than I am in social media.
I drive a minivan to transport my toddler and all of her gear.
i have two siblings.

content.text: Hi! I'm new here, nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What's your name?
My name is Kate. What's yours?
Hi Kate, my name is Jen.
It's nice to meet you Jen.
You too, Kate. So, what are your interests?
I love cats, I have one and he's the light of my life. I also love playing tennis and listening to the Rolling Stones.
I love cats too! I have two. I'm also not very coordinated and I'm always tripping over my own feet.
Me too! I've moved a lot in my life, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.
That's funny, I always take my favorite red clothes with me when I move.
Oh, I love red too! What are your favorite bands?
I love the Rolling Stones, the Beatles, and the Eagles.
Oh, I love the Rolling Stones too! They're my favorite band.
They're so good! I love their music.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who likes the same things I do.
